tourist_places.name: Taj Mahal
tourist_places.description: The iconic white marble mausoleum is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most famous landmarks in India.

tourist_places.name: Jaipur
tourist_places.description: Known as the 'Pink City,' Jaipur is famous for its historic palaces, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage.

tourist_places.name: Kerala
tourist_places.description: A picturesque state in South India, known for its backwaters, lush greenery, and serene beaches.

tourist_places.name: Goa
tourist_places.description: A popular beach destination with a vibrant nightlife, water sports, and a mix of Portuguese and Indian culture.

tourist_places.name: Varanasi
tourist_places.description: One of the oldest continually inhabited cities in the world, famous for its ghats along the Ganges River.

tourist_places.name: Himalayas
tourist_places.description: A majestic mountain range offering trekking, adventure, and stunning natural beauty.

tourist_places.name: Mumbai
tourist_places.description: India's financial capital, known for its bustling city life, historic landmarks, and Bollywood.

tourist_places.name: Delhi
tourist_places.description: India's capital city, with a rich history, historic monuments, and a vibrant street food scene.

tourist_places.name: Rajasthan
tourist_places.description: A state known for its royal palaces, desert landscapes, and colorful culture.

tourist_places.name: Kashmir
tourist_places.description: Famous for its breathtaking landscapes, including the Dal Lake and scenic mountain ranges.

tourist_places.name: Mysore
tourist_places.description: Known for the opulent Mysore Palace and vibrant Dasara festival celebrations.

tourist_places.name: Agra Fort
tourist_places.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its historical significance and stunning architecture.

tourist_places.name: Kolkata
tourist_places.description: A city with a rich cultural heritage, known for its arts, literature, and delicious cuisine.

tourist_places.name: Amritsar
tourist_places.description: Home to the Golden Temple, a spiritual and cultural landmark for Sikhs.

tourist_places.name: Jaisalmer
tourist_places.description: Famous for its golden sand dunes, camel safaris, and the Jaisalmer Fort.

tourist_places.name: Munnar
tourist_places.description: A hill station known for its tea plantations, lush greenery, and cool climate.

tourist_places.name: Khajuraho
tourist_places.description: Famous for its intricately carved temples with stunning erotic art.

tourist_places.name: Gokarna
tourist_places.description: A peaceful beach town with beautiful beaches and a laid-back atmosphere.

tourist_places.name: Rishikesh
tourist_places.description: A spiritual and adventure destination on the banks of the Ganges River.
